com.stickycoding.Rokon
Class TextureManager

java.lang.Object
  com.stickycoding.Rokon.TextureManager

public class TextureManager
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Richard This interfaces between TextureAtlas's and the hardware, load/change/destroy events must be queued up so they can be processed on the next frame

Constructor Summary
TextureManager()
           
 
Method Summary
static void changeTextures(GL10 gl)
          Synchronises any changes in TextureAtlas settings with the hardware
static TextureAtlas[] getActiveAtlas()
           
static TextureAtlas[] getChangeQueue()
           
static int getCurrentTexture()
           
static TextureAtlas[] getLoadQueue()
           
static TextureAtlas[] getRemoveQueue()
           
static boolean hasChangeQueue()
           
static boolean hasLoadQueue()
           
static boolean hasRemoveQueue()
           
static void load(TextureAtlas textureAtlas)
          Places a TextureAtlas into the loading queue, which will load it onto the hardware
static void loadTextures(GL10 gl)
          Loads any TextureAtlas's onto the hardware
static void markForChange(TextureAtlas textureAtlas)
          Marks a TextureAtlas for change, in that the options must be reloaded onto the hardware - these are set by various methods in TextureAtlas, this must be called afterwards
static void prepare()
          Prepares the variables for being used, may be needed to clear memory from a previous launch - called each time the engine is created
static void reload()
          Moves all active TextureAtlas classes to the load queue (used in onResume)
static void remove(TextureAtlas textureAtlas)
          Removes a TextureAtlas from the hardware on the next frame
static void removeFromActive(TextureAtlas textureAtlas)
           
static void removeTextures(GL10 gl)
          Removes any TextureAtlas's from the hardware that aren't wanted any more
static void setActive(TextureAtlas textureAtlas)
          Places a TextureAtlas into the active array, this represents all those who are on the hardware - and will be reloaded at onResume
static void setCurrentTexture(int index)
          Informs TextureManager that there has been a change in current texture index
static void updateTextures(GL10 gl)
          Updates all the TextureAtlas's as necessary

equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

hasLoadQueue

public static boolean hasLoadQueue()
Returns:
TRUE if there are textures in the load queue, FALSE otherwise

hasChangeQueue

public static boolean hasChangeQueue()
Returns:
TRUE if there are textures which need options changing, FALSE otherwise

hasRemoveQueue

public static boolean hasRemoveQueue()
Returns:
TRUE if there are textures which need removing from the hardware, FALSE otherwise
